$description: Radio component tokens. Radio buttons allow users to select exactly one option from a set. These tokens compose primitive tokens into radio-specific configurations. Mirrors checkbox patterns closely but uses circular shapes. Use radios for: mutually exclusive options, single-select lists, preference settings. ACCESSIBILITY: Always group radios with a visible legend; ensure tab navigation and arrow-key cycling work correctly.

size.$description: Radio circle diameter (width and height are equal). Size should match surrounding UI density. Larger sizes improve touch targets and accessibility.

xs.$description: Extra small radio size (14px). Use for: compact data tables, dense lists, space-constrained UIs. May not meet touch target guidelines (44px) - consider for mouse-only interfaces.

sm.$description: Small radio size (16px). Use for: standard form density, inline options, filter panels. Common in desktop applications.

md.$description: Medium radio size (20px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most forms, settings panels, standalone options. Good balance of visibility and space efficiency.

lg.$description: Large radio size (24px). Use for: touch-optimized interfaces, accessibility-focused forms, prominent single options. Better for mobile devices.

xl.$description: Extra large radio size (28px). Use for: high-emphasis standalone selections, large touch targets, accessibility requirements. Maximum visibility and tap target size.

borderRadius.$description: Radio border radius (full/50%). Circular shape distinguishes radio buttons from checkboxes (which are square with minimal rounding).

borderWidth.$description: Radio border width (1px). Thin border provides clear boundary without visual heaviness. Thickens visually when selected due to fill color.

innerCircle.$description: Inner circle (dot) configuration for selected state. The dot should be proportional to the radio size and clearly visible.

xs.$description: Extra small inner dot size (6px). Proportional to xs radio. Small but visible indicator of selected state.

sm.$description: Small inner dot size (7px). Proportional to sm radio.

md.$description: Medium inner dot size (8px). DEFAULT. Proportional to md radio. Clear visual feedback for selected state.

lg.$description: Large inner dot size (10px). Proportional to lg radio. More prominent dot for better visibility.

xl.$description: Extra large inner dot size (12px). Proportional to xl radio. Maximum visibility dot.

label.$description: Radio label configuration. Labels should be clickable to toggle the radio (larger hit area improves usability).

gap.$description: Gap between radio and label (12px). Provides clear visual separation while maintaining association. Label click should toggle radio.

fontSize.$description: Label font size (14px). Standard body text size for form labels. Readable alongside radio without overwhelming.

transition.$description: Radio state transition configuration. Quick transitions provide immediate feedback for user interactions.

duration.$description: Radio transition duration (100ms). Fast transition for snappy feedback when selecting. Should feel instant but smooth.

easing.$description: Radio transition easing (ease-out). Decelerating motion feels natural for selection actions.

focus.$description: Radio focus ring configuration. Visible focus indicators are essential for keyboard navigation and accessibility (WCAG 2.4.7).

ringWidth.$description: Focus ring width (2px). Clearly visible ring around radio when focused via keyboard. Essential for accessibility compliance.

ringOffset.$description: Focus ring offset (2px). Space between radio border and focus ring. Prevents ring from overlapping radio border.
